task.title: Restarting the appliance by using the command line
task.shortdesc: System administrators can restart the appliance by using the device restart command on the command line.

taskbody.context: You can restart the appliance by using the command line, or by using the . For more information about using the to restart the appliance, see .

step.cmd: To restart the appliance, enter the following command:
step.info: device restartIf you are connected to the command line through a network connection, your network connection is ended during the restart.
